headline: AbbVie Stock: Using A Long-Term Leap Ratio Spread On This Pharma Giant
summary: Positive post-earnings and a general upward draft of price action in the markets make for a strong argument for a bullish setup on AbbVie.

headline: Ardelyx: Revenue Misses And Losses Widen Amid XPHOZAH Uncertainty

headline: Shareholders of Cerevel Therapeutics Holdings, Inc. Should Contact Levi & Korsinsky Before June 3, 2025 to Discuss Your Rights - ABBV
summary: NEW YORK, May 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Levi & Korsinsky, LLP notifies investors in Cerevel Therapeutics Holdings, Inc. of a class action securities lawsuit. ...
